item.description:
PROBABLE CAUSE - 17th ANNIVERSARY SHOW!
Worcester's most popular band is celebrating 17 years together. 17 years!! Where else but their home at THE IRISH TIMES would these guys throw the best party of their 17 year careers!

T-Shirts, Giveaways, and drinking ALL NIGHT LONG!

Date
Saturday, Apr 07, 2007 09:00 PM to Sunday, Apr 08, 2007 02:00 AM

Location
tHE iRISH tIMES
244 Main St

Worcester, MA 01608
MapQuest Yahoo! Maps
item.name: Probable Cause Band
